name: Pixel Feast
description:
Try not to starve to death by eating procedurally generated animals and plants. Use your tongue for everything. Gain XP and level up while listening to my beautiful music. Also has high scores!

Instructions:

  • Red Bar = Health / Green bar = Hunger
  • A+D / Left+Right arrow keys - Movement
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Left Mouse Button (hold) - Tongue attack/grab food
  • ESC - Back
